category.name: Interface.Common Client
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: UsePropertyStylesheetPlatformRenderer
preference.preference_description: Defines what types of stylesheet (XRT and HTML) can be used for rendering objects in the "Summary", "Form", "Create", and "Save As" dialogs. Valid values are: * true: then only XRT stylesheets are used. This is the default value. * false: HTML stylesheets may also be used.
